#include <iostream>
//#define f(x) cin>>(x)
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

inline void f(long long *a)
{
  register char c=0;
  while (c<33) c=getchar_unlocked();
  *a=0;
  while (c>33)
    {
      *a=*a*10+c-'0';
      c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
}

int main()
{
    long long t;
    long long n, m, g;
    f(&t);

    while(t--) {
        f(&n), f(&m);
        long long val = m;
        g = __gcd(n,m);
        long long sum = 0;
        g = m-g;
        sum = n*(m-1LL);
        printf("%lld\n", sum-g);
    }
}
